about_the_game:
Make your city look festive for any occasion and season with the Seasonal Decorations Pack, including 24 new ornaments themed after the four seasons.
• 6 spring-themed ornaments to celebrate the season of flowers and love.
• 6 summer-themed ornaments to invite your residents to a traditional wine festival.
• 6 fall-themed ornaments letting you ring in the spooky season with pumpkins and a bonfire.
• 6 winter-themed ornaments allowing your residents to engage in traditional activities like ice skating.
detailed_description:
Make your city look festive for any occasion and season with the Seasonal Decorations Pack, including 24 new ornaments themed after the four seasons.
• 6 spring-themed ornaments to celebrate the season of flowers and love.
• 6 summer-themed ornaments to invite your residents to a traditional wine festival.
• 6 fall-themed ornaments letting you ring in the spooky season with pumpkins and a bonfire.
• 6 winter-themed ornaments allowing your residents to engage in traditional activities like ice skating.

name: Anno 1800 - Seasonal Decorations Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10(64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3470, AMD FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 670 GTX or AMD Radeon R9 285 (2 GB of VRAM, Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or Windows 10(64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 4690k, AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon RX 480 (4 GB of VRAM, Shader Model 5.1)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

oflc.descriptors:
Mild violence and coarse language
Online interactivity

short_description: Celebrate the seasons with 24 new ornaments for your cities, from spring-themed flowers to Halloween decorations.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
